info.title: Service Bus
info.description: Connect to Azure Service Bus to send and receive messages. You can perform actions such as send to queue, send to topic, receive from queue, receive from subscription, etc.

get.summary: Get all queues
get.description: This operation gets all queues in the Service Bus namespace.

get.summary: Get all topics
get.description: This operation gets all topics in the Service Bus namespace.

get.summary: Get the subscriptions for a topic
get.description: This operation gets the list of subscriptions for a topic in the Service Bus namespace.

get.summary: Get all entities
get.description: This operation gets all queues and topics in the Service Bus namespace.

get.summary: Get the list of system properties
get.description: This operation gets list of properties.

get.summary: Get session options
get.description: This operation gets the list of options for session handling - None, Next available.

post.description: This operation sends a message to a queue or topic.

parameters.name: entityName
parameters.description: Name of the queue or topic

parameters.name: systemProperties
parameters.description: System properties - None or Run Details. Run Details will add run metadata property details as custom properties in the message.

post.description: This operation sends one or more messages to a queue or topic.

parameters.name: entityName
parameters.description: Name of the queue or topic

parameters.name: systemProperties
parameters.description: System properties - None or Run Details. Run Details will add run metadata property details as custom properties in the message.

get.summary: When a message is received in a queue (auto-complete)
get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a message is received in a queue and auto completes the message.

get.summary: When a message is received in a queue (peek-lock)
get.description: The operation triggers a flow when a message received in a queue with peek-lock mode.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: Session id - None or Next Available or provide session id

delete.summary: Complete the message in a queue
delete.description: The operation completes a message in a queue.

parameters.name: lockToken
parameters.description: Lock token of the message to complete

post.summary: Abandon the message in a queue
post.description: The operation abandons a message in a queue.

parameters.name: lockToken
parameters.description: Lock token of the message to abandon

get.summary: Get deferred message from a queue
get.description: The operation gets a deferred message from a queue.

post.summary: Defer the message in a queue
post.description: The operation defers a message in a queue.

parameters.name: lockToken
parameters.description: Lock token of the message to defer

post.summary: Dead-letter the message in a queue
post.description: The operation moves the message to the Dead-Letter Queue.

parameters.name: lockToken
parameters.description: Lock token of the message to dead-letter

post.summary: Renew lock on the message in a queue
post.description: The operation renews lock on a message in a queue.

parameters.name: lockToken
parameters.description: Lock token of the message to renew lock

get.summary: When one or more messages arrive in a queue (auto-complete)
get.description: The operation receives one or more messages from a queue. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

parameters.name: maxMessageCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of messages to return in the batch

get.summary: When one or more messages arrive in a queue (peek-lock)
get.description: The operation receives one or more messages from a queue with peek-lock. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

parameters.name: maxMessageCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of messages to return in the batch

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: Session id - None or Next Available or provide session id

get.summary: Get messages from a queue (peek-lock)
get.description: The operation receives messages from a queue with peek-lock. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

parameters.name: maxMessageCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of messages to return in the batch

delete.summary: Close a session in a queue
delete.description: The operation closes a session in a queue.

post.summary: Renew lock on the session in a queue
post.description: The operation renews a session in a queue.

get.summary: When a message is received in a topic subscription (auto-complete)
get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a message is received in a topic subscription and auto completes the message.

get.summary: When a message is received in a topic subscription (peek-lock)
get.description: The operation triggers a flow when a message received in a topic subscription with peek-lock mode.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: Session id - None or Next Available or provide session id

delete.summary: Complete the message in a topic subscription
delete.description: The operation completes a message in a topic subscription.

parameters.name: lockToken
parameters.description: Lock token of the message to complete

post.summary: Abandon the message in a topic subscription
post.description: The operation abandons a message in a topic subscription.

parameters.name: lockToken
parameters.description: Lock token of the message to abandon

get.summary: Get deferred message from a topic subscription
get.description: The operation gets a deferred message from a topic subscription.

post.summary: Defer the message in a topic subscription
post.description: The operation defers a message in a topic subscription.

parameters.name: lockToken
parameters.description: Lock token of the message to defer

post.summary: Dead-letter the message in a topic subscription
post.description: The operation moves the message to the topic Dead-Letter Queue.

parameters.name: lockToken
parameters.description: Lock token of the message to dead-letter

post.summary: Renew lock on the message in a topic subscription
post.description: The operation renews lock on a message in a topic subscription.

parameters.name: lockToken
parameters.description: Lock token of the message to renew lock

post.description: The operation creates a topic subscription.

delete.description: The operation deletes a topic subscription.

get.summary: When one or more messages arrive in a topic (auto-complete)
get.description: The operation receives one or more messages from a topic. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

parameters.name: maxMessageCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of messages to return in the batch

get.summary: When one or more messages arrive in a topic (peek-lock)
get.description: The operation receives one or more messages from a topic with peek-lock. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

parameters.name: maxMessageCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of messages to return in the batch

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: Session id - None or Next Available or provide session id

get.summary: Get messages from a topic subscription (peek-lock)
get.description: The operation receives messages from a topic subscription with peek-lock. If maximum message count is not provided, it reads 20 messages.

parameters.name: maxMessageCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of messages to return in the batch

delete.summary: Close a session in the topic
delete.description: The operation closes a session in the topic.

post.summary: Renew lock on the session in a topic subscription
post.description: The operation renews a session in a topic subscription.

get.summary: Get metadata of a filter
get.description: Get metadata of a filter

get.summary: Get metadata of a filter
get.description: Get metadata of a filter.

ServiceBusEntity.description: Entity with name and display name.

DisplayName.description: The display name for the entity

ContentType.description: Content type of the message content

Properties.description: Key-value pairs for each brokered property

MessageId.description: This is a user-defined value that Service Bus can use to identify duplicate messages, if enabled.

ReplyTo.description: Address of the queue to reply to

ReplyToSessionId.description: Identifier of the session to reply to

ScheduledEnqueueTimeUtc.description: Date and time, in UTC, when the message will be added to the queue

LockToken.description: The lock token of the message as a string.

TimeToLive.description: This is the duration, in ticks, that a message is valid.  The duration starts from when the message is sent to the Service Bus.

SubscriptionFilter.description: The service bus filter for a topic subscription.

SubscriptionCorrelationFilter.description: This object has the basic properties of a message for the correlation filter.

MessageId.description: This is a user-defined value that Service Bus can use to identify duplicate messages, if enabled.

Properties.description: Key-value pairs for each brokered property

ReplyTo.description: Address of the queue to reply to

ReplyToSessionId.description: Identifier of the session to reply to

ContentType.description: Content type of the message content
